Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and will field
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Hope doesn’t pull any punches in his post match interview describing his own hundred as 'irrelevant' adding 'if it doesn’t contribute to wins, it does not matter.'
Liam Livingstone is the Player of the Match
Liam Livingstone seals the win with a drive to mid off. A broad grin bursts across his face as he sees his side home and finishes unbeaten on 124* off 84 balls. Sublime innings.
The series is level at 1-1 with a decider in Barbados coming up on Wednesday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The outfield was heavy, the surface was up and down
